query:
INSERT INTO api_keys (
                id,
                name,
                description,
                prefix,
                hashed_secret,
                scopes,
                status,
                expires_in,
                expires_at,
                revoked_at,
                last_used_at,
                created_by,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            )
            VALUES (
                $1,
                $2,
                $3,
                $4,
                $5,
                $6::api_scope[],
                $7::api_key_status,
                $8,
                $9,
                $10,
                $11,
                $12,
                $13,
                $14
            )
